definitions.title: vb. Pilp.,
definitions.body: etc., sport, take delight in, delight (usu. made = I. ´[[שׁ]]: smooth over, please; Buhl cp. Aram. 49o0, Ithpe. sport, trifle, Vulg. Ar. m4949 (loan-word ?) Vollers:ZMG xiv (1891), 86, 1. 3);—

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְשִׁעֲשַׁע]] Is 29:9 the suckling shall sport on ([[עַל]]) the cobra’s hole; 1 s. [[שִׁעֲשָָׁעְתִּי]] Ps 119:70 I take delight in thy law (acc.; but ? rd. [[שַׁעֲשֻׁעָָי]], v:Ps 119:77); Impf. transit. 3 mpl. [[יְשַׁעַשְׁעוּ]] Ps 94:19 thy consolations delight my soul (acc.).

definitions.title: Palp.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[תְּשָֽׁעֳשָָׁעוּ]]Is 66:12 upon ([[עַל]]) the knees shall ye be fondled.

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[אֶשְׁתַּעֲשָָׁע]] Ps 119:16 in ([[ב]]) thy statutes will I delight myself, cf. v:Ps 119:47.
